<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.44

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attempts to sort given array either in ascending ([[true]]) or descending ([[false]]) order. All array elements should be one of the following types:
* [[String]] - array of strings (["a","b","c"...])
* [[Number]] - array of numbers ([1,2,3...])
* [[Array]] - array of subarrays (<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>["a",1,2],["b",3,4],["c",5,6]...]). Subarrays should be of the same structure. Subarray elements other than [[String]] or [[Number]] will be ignored during sorting.
Mixed arrays (["a",1,[true]...]) are not supported and results are undefined.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> array '''sort''' order

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> order: [[Boolean]] - [[true]]: ascending, [[false]]: descending

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [5.21725,1.30859,4,5.03028,1];
_arr [[sort]] [[true]];
[[hint]] [[str]] _arr; //[1,1.30859,4,5.03028,5.21725]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_dev = ["ja","pa","pa","tram","tara"];
_dev [[sort]] [[false]];
[[hint]] [[str]] _dev; //["tram","tara","pa","pa","ja"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>#</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>define ASC true
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>#</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>define DESC false
_scores = [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[123,"bob",15],[123,"bill",20],[200,"dave",21],[200,"steve",11]];
_scores [[sort]] DESC;
[[hint]] [[str]] _scores; //<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[200,"steve",11],[200,"dave",21],[123,"bob",15],[123,"bill",20]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Sort buildings by distance and return position of the most distant building:<code>_buildings = [[player]] [[nearObjects]] ["Land_Cargo_Patrol_V1_F", 500];
_buildings = _buildings [[apply]] { [_x [[distance]] [[player]], _x] };
_buildings [[sort]] [[false]];
[[hint]] [[format]] [
	"Most distant building is at %1, distance %2 m", 
	[[getPos]] (_buildings [[select]] 0 [[select]] 1),
	[[round]] (_buildings [[select]] 0 [[select]] 0)
];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[set]], [[pushBack]], [[pushBackUnique]], [[apply]], [[select]], [[resize]], [[reverse]], [[count]], [[find]], [[in]], [[forEach]], [[deleteAt]], [[deleteRange]], [[append]], [[toArray]], [[toString]], [[param]], [[params]], [[arrayIntersect]], [[splitString]], [[joinString]], [[BIS_fnc_sortAlphabetically]], [[BIS_fnc_sortBy]], [[BIS_fnc_sortNum]]
</value></part></template>
